abilities.name: Natural Healing
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may remove 1 damage counter from Blaine's Vulpix. This power can't be used if Blaine's Vulpix is Asleep, Confused, or Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Tail Fan
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Confused.
